description: Download the compiled CSS and JS, all source code.

description: Get started with FastBootstrap in no time.
title: Quick Start

description: Using our new dark mode on your site.
title: Dark Mode

description: Overview of our new Bootstrap theme, what's different from Bootstrap.
title: What's New

description: Accordion component allows the user to show and hide sections of related content on a page.
title: Accordion

description: Alerts is flash messages that shows contextual feedback messages for attracts the user's attention without interrupting the user's task.
title: Alerts

description: Utilities for controlling how rows are positioned in multi-row flex and grid containers.
title: Align Content

description: Utilities for controlling how flex and grid items are positioned along a container's cross axis.
title: Align Items

description: Utilities for controlling how an individual flex or grid item is positioned along its container's cross axis.
title: Align Self

description: Utilities for animating elements with CSS animations.
title: Animation

description: Utilities for controlling the aspect ratio of an element.
title: Aspect Ratio

description: Avatar component is a visual representation of an entity, such as a user or an organization.
title: Avatar

description: Avatar group component displays a number of avatars grouped together in a stack.
title: Avatar Group

description: Utilities for controlling the background color of an element.
title: Background Color

description: Badges are used to inform users of the status of an object or of an action that’s been taken.
title: Badge

description: Blankslates are used as placeholders when there is a lack of content within a page or section.
title: Blankslate

description: Utilities for controlling the border color of an element.
title: Border Color

description: Utilities for controlling the opacity of an element's border color.
title: Border Opacity

description: Utilities for controlling the border radius of an element.
title: Border Radius

description: Utilities for controlling the border of an element, including border style and sides.
title: Border Side

description: Utilities for controlling the style of an element's borders.
title: Border Style

description: Utilities for controlling the border width of an element.
title: Border Width

description: Use the box-shadow utilities to controlling the shadow of an element.
title: Box Shadow

description: Breadcrumbs component are a navigation system show hierarchy and navigational context for a user’s location within an app.
title: Breadcrumb

description: Breakpoints are customizable widths that determine how your responsive layout behaves across device or viewport sizes.
title: Breakpoints

description: Buttons allow users to perform an action or to navigate to another page, with a single tap.
title: Button

description: Button group component is a grouping of buttons that gives users access to frequently performed, related actions.
title: Button Group

description: Cards used to group similar information into flexible containers to let users to browse a collection of related items and actions.
title: Card

description: Carousel are slideshow for cycling through multiple elements such as images, videos, or text.
title: Carousel

description: Checkboxs allow users to select multiple items from a list of individual items, or to mark one individual item as selected.
title: Checkbox

description: Utilities for controlling the wrapping of content around an element.
title: Clear

description: Quickly and easily clear floated content within a container.
title: Clearfix

description: A close button used for dismissing content like modals and alerts.
title: Close Button

description: Collapse are expansion panel allows users can expand or collapse the long sections of information.
title: Collapse

description: Our color system is based on a Atlassian design color foundation that designed for our components and element styles.
title: Color System

description: A responsive grid allows a layout to change dynamically based on the size of the screen.
title: Columns

description: Containers are a fundamental building block of Bootstrap that contain, pad, and align your content within a given device or viewport.
title: Containers

description: Utilities for controlling the content of the before and after pseudo-elements.
title: Content

description: CSS Grid is allows for two-dimensional layouts to be created on the web.
title: CSS Grid

description: Quickly and responsively toggle the display value of components and more with our display utilities. Includes support for some of the more common values, as well as some extras for controlling display when printing.
title: Display

description: Dropdown displays a list of actions or options allows the user to select one.
title: Dropdown

description: Utilities for controlling the displaying related images and text with the figure element.
title: Figures

description: Utilities for controlling how flex items both grow and shrink.
title: Flex

title: Flex Direction

title: Flex Grow

description: Utilities for controlling how flex items shrink.
title: Flex Shrink

description: Utilities for controlling how flex items wrap.
title: Flex Wrap

description: Floating label display the type of input in floating over an input fields.
title: Floating Label

description: Toggle floats on any element, across any breakpoint, using our responsive float utilities.
title: Floats

title: Focus ring

description: Utilities for controlling the font family of an element.
title: Font Family

description: Utilities for controlling the font size of an element.
title: Font Size

description: Utilities for controlling the font style of an element.
title: Font Style

description: Utilities for controlling the font weight of an element.
title: Font Weight

description: Form element allows users to input information.

description: Utilities for controlling gutters between grid and flexbox items.

description: A responsive grid allows a layout to change dynamically based on the size of the screen.
title: Grid

title: Gutters

description: Utilities for setting the height of an element.
title: Height

description: Use these helpers to visually hide elements but keep them accessible to assistive technologies.
title: Hidden

description: Quickly create stylized hyperlinks with Bootstrap Icons or other icons.
title: Icon link

description: Utilities for controlling images.
title: Images

description: Input group allows users to grouping related form controls in a single input.
title: Input Group

description: Utilities for controlling how flex and grid items are positioned along a container's main axis.
title: Justify Content

description: Layout are build page layouts with 2 columns.
title: Layout

description: Utilities for controlling the tracking (letter spacing) of an element.
title: Letter Spacing

description: Utilities for controlling the line height of an element's text.
title: Line Height

description: Links allow users to navigate to a different location.
title: Link

description: List gorup used for displays a continuous group of text or images.
title: List Group

description: Utilities for controlling an element's margin.
title: Margin

description: Utilities for setting the maximum width of an element.
title: Max-Width

description: Utilities for setting the minium width of an element.
title: Min-Width

title: Navbar

description: Offcanvas is a hidden sidebar on the page used for navigation, shopping carts, etc.
title: Offcanvas

description: Control the opacity of elements.
title: Opacity

description: Utilities for controlling the order of flex and grid items.
title: Order

description: Use these shorthand utilities for quickly configuring how content overflows an element.
title: Overflow

description: Utilities for controlling an element's padding.
title: Padding

description: Pagination allows you to divide large amounts of content into smaller chunks across multiple pages.
title: Pagination

description: Pills allows users navigate to another pages or switch to another content on the same page.
title: Pills

description: Placeholders used for loading placeholders for your content before the data gets loaded on the page.
title: Placeholders

description: Utilities for controlling whether an element responds to pointer events.
title: Pointer Events

description: Popovers are containers used to display transient content such as menus, options, additional actions, and more in an overlay.
title: Popover

description: Use these shorthand utilities for quickly configuring the position of an element.
title: Position

description: Progress bar indicators commonly known as spinners, express an unspecified wait time or display the length of a process.
title: Progress bar

description: Radio group allows users to select only one option from a number of choices.
title: Radio Group

description: Range slider component lets users choose a numeric value from the given values on a slider.
title: Range slider

description: A collection of element-specific CSS to provide an elegant, consistent, and simple baseline to build upon.
title: Reboot

description: Utilities for rotating elements with transform.
title: Rotate

description: Scrollspy plugin allows automatically scroll into the particular element in the viewport.
title: Scrollspy

description: Select input allows users to make a single selection or multiple selections from a list of options in a limited space.
title: Select Input

description: Spinner is an animated spinning icon that lets users know content is being loaded.
title: Spinner

description: The custom vertical rule helper to create vertical dividers like the `<hr>` element
title: Stacks

description: Stretched link allow users to navigate to a different location on overlay elements.
title: Stretched Link

description: Switches allow users to turn an individual option on or off.
title: Switch

description: Tables are used to organize and display information.
title: Table

description: Tabs organize content into multiple sections on the same page and allow users to navigate between them.
title: Tabs

title: Text Align

description: Utilities for controlling the text color of an element.
title: Text Color

description: Utilities for controlling the decoration of text.

title: Text Overflow

description: Utilities for controlling the transformation of text.
title: Text Transform

description: Toasts display brief, temporary notifications for users on the outcome of an action.
title: Toast

description: Tooltips is a floating, non-actionable label show contextual help or specific feature when a user hovers or focuses on an element.
title: Tooltip

description: Utilities for controlling whether the user can select text in an element.
title: User Select

description: Validation provide a valuable, actionable feedback to your users with HTML5 form validation.
title: Validation

title: Vertical Align

title: Vertical Line

title: Visibility

title: Width
